Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Harrison/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Polk, Harrison, Jackson and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Harrison/Kedzie.
